raw_mentions: There are no sentences that meet the specified criteria. The text does not contain any sentences with a specific molecule name, a bioactivity metric (IC50, Ki, Kd, EC50), a numeric value for that metric, and a unit for that value.

In certain embodiments, an antibody that specifically binds to (or has specificity for) an antigen means that the antibody binds to or has specificity for an antigen in an amount of less than about 10 <sup>-5</sup> M, e.g. less than about 10 <sup>-6</sup> M、10 <sup>-7</sup> M、10 <sup>-8</sup> M、10 <sup>-9</sup> M or 10 <sup>-10</sup> M or less affinity (KD) binds the antigen.
